Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie centers around his famous work “Gauche the Cellist”, and carries forward to where the book ends—the moment when Gauche’s presence is gone but not forgotten.
